      Enna Reading Wall Sconce

      SPEC #: AST880984

      ID: 1058040

      The Enna Wall Sconce brings a clean architectural vibe to a variety of spaces in your home. The cylindrical shade is complemented by a smooth stem that can swing from one side to the other. Head tilts 90 degrees and rotates 330 degrees. Available in Matte Gold, Matte White, and Matte Black finishes. Switch is located on backplate. Mounts to 4 inch octagon box. No LED driver rquired. ETL listed.

      Available Options

      Finish: Matte Black, Matte Gold, Matte White

      Specifications

        • Finish: Matte Gold
        • Size: 4.33"W x 7.28"H x 10.63"D
        • Backplate: 4.33" Dia.
        • Dimmer: Not Dimmable
        • Materials: Steel
        • Lamp Source: LED
        • Bulb:
          1 x LED/4.7W/120V LED
          Integrated LED module
        • Total Wattage: 4.7 watts
        • Lamp Color: 2700K
        • Color Rendering: 90 CRI
        • Delivered Lumens: 105 lumens
        • Lumens/Watt: 22.34
        • Lamp Life: 60000 hours
          • Country of Origin: China

        ETL

        Net Zero Commitment

        Eco-Conscious Packaging

        Specification Sheet / Technical Files

        • Specification Sheet
        Prop 65 Warning for California Residents This product can expose you to chemicals, which are known in the State of California to cause cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to https://www.p65warnings.ca.gov/.

        For over 27 years, our founders have shared a passion for British lighting design and a vision to create products with distinctive quality. Designed with a pared-down aesthetic, each Astro luminaire is inspired by architectural details and is engineered using the best possible materials and tooling to deliver timeless lighting solutions. Whether you're looking for bathroom, interior, or exterior lighting, our commitment to quality ensures every luminaire is created to withstand the test of time.

        Explore Astro Lighting
